name: Solid Slime
description:
A 2D, pixel art, platforming experience centered around a loveable, little slime. This game plays a major twist on the idea of platforming, as you can become the platform. Freeze your little slime buddy in mid-air to create your own path to victory! This tech-demo was made for the Secret Santa Jam 2021.

Check out the GitHub repo HERE

A majority of the creation of this game was made while I was recovering from a bone graph + wisdom teeth removal surgery meaning that I was very loopy on all sorts of medicine! Hopefully that adds to your enjoyment of the game...

Controls:

  • R: Reset Level
  • Left Shift: Freeze
  • Space: Jump
  • A/D: Movement L/R
